review: At the time of writing, the FireTV Stick will not connect to Wi-Fi networks that have a passphrase containing a backslash (and possibly other special characters). This is unacceptable and I have no idea how it passed QA. If others are having trouble connecting to Wi-Fi, this is probably why.
author: R. Thrash

review: Great price. Didn't know it would have to be plugged up all the time.
author: Becky Sylar

review: We had a Roku that was forever losing internet connection. With the Fire TV Stick it stays connected and we are enjoying all the great movies and TV shows that are on Amazon Prime. Our son is so impressed with the Fire Stick he is going to purchase one for himself. Can not go wrong with this purchase.
author: NCstatemom

review: I bought this as a gift for my brother.  However, I tested it before sending it.  It was easy to install and I was immediately was able to locate movies which interested me.  My brother does not have cable so this gift will allow him to catch up on many missed sci-fi episodes.
author: Ria

review: so far I am really pleased with the fire TV stick. Controller and menu response is quick and accurate a lot more convenient then turning on my Xbox to watch Amazon prime movies. it syncs with all of my other Amazon accounts which comes in very handy and convenient when showing off photos I have put on the Amazon cloud.
author: chris p

review: I gave this item two stars because I haven't been able to get this to work., and I bought two of them.  When I plug it in it gets processed all the way to  when it is support to update.  And it doesn't.  There is a message that comes on the screen telling me to contact www.amazonfire.com/tv but when you do there is absolutely nothing the comes up for technical support. I spent 40.00 dollars for nothing or for something that doesn't work or have a contact for technical support.

review: Love the Fire TV Stick. If you are a prime member it's a great  buy. Video quality is great.
